resources.string:
Control your marker with [UP], [DOWN], [LEFT] and [RIGHT]. Use [back] key to leave game and return to menu.


 SETTINGS

 Random move interval:
 interval in milliseconds between automatic movement of the local player.

 send interval:
 Our application will send outgoing data in regular intervals, not immediately upon interaction. This allows peer to cumulate more data in a single packet. 

 dispatch interval:
 Incoming messages will be stored in a queue, until the LitePeer.dispatchIncomingMessages() method is called. Dispatching empties the queue, and will fire the related callback of each incoming message.

 Player name:
 Name displayed to other players.

 Server address:
 Address of a photon realtime server. Can contain port.

 Game name:
 Unique ID of the Game instance to join / create. 

 Player color:
 Color of your marker in web format ('#RRGGBB' or 'red' are ok).
